name: Dungeoneers (MiyoAkihiko, Evil Necroverlord, Nekupon)
description:
Resolve puzzles, escape the dungeon.

*Use four simultaneous adventurers with uniques abilities! Use A, S, D, W to change between them, I, J, K, L to move and Space to activate the ability.
*Each adventurer has his ouw screen.
*Activate interruptors, deactivate traps and evade dangers to win.

-Abilities-

(A)belardo - He can turn himself into a shadow to avoid traps.

(S)olomeo - He can use magic to activate mechanisms.

(D)ardo - He can shoot arrow and jump through walls.

(W)alter - He can use his shield to take cover from arrows.

-Credits-

Miyo Akihiko.

Nekupon.

Asdedo.
